experience.title: Sales analyst
experience.description: 1.Communicate with management team regularly2.Review past sales data to determine trends in productivity3.Prepare accurate reports using data from internal and external sources4.Use Machine learning algorithm to solve business problems5.Evaluate third-party data to determine best practices for company success6.Present actionable information and insights to team members and management7.Gather and analyze data in order to understand problems and address them proactively8.Collaborate with team members and members of other departments

projects: [{"title":"SEMANTIC CLUSTERING OF FEATURS USING NON-LOCAL WORD CO-OCCURENCE GRAPH IN NATURAL LANGUAGE PROCEESINGOCESSING","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"•Worked on unstructured data - Amazon food reviews dataset•Developed a Algorithm to cluster similar features in the corpus•Used Breadth First search algorithm ,Word2vec similarity score,CountVectorizer and co-occurence matrixnormalised score"},{"title":"TERM PROJECT | DEEP LEARNING BASED FACE MASK DETECTION AND SOCIAL DISTANCE MONITORING FRAMEWORK","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"•3 Class Face Mask Detection using Mobile Net Architecture (Convolutional Neural Network)•Social Distancing Monitoring Framework using YOLOv3 architecture."},{"title":"Spread of covid 19 simulation","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"A simulation has been done in python using different libraries( pandas ,numpy,NetworkX,pydot ) and spread of the coronavirus is predicted considering factors like age ,comorbid and economic status,basically a random data of 100 people is generated and using power law as a social contact network develop the spread of disease in time span of 50 days"},{"title":"Maintenance operability study(Web development)","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"Developed the software using HTML, CSS and python(flask library) where the user can put the information in the form presented in the browser related to any maintenance work required in the industry or the department and submit the details.After submitting all the information will be shown to the user a pop up will be there and all the information will be stored in the database and also at the backend a risk_factor calculation will be done and shown in the data base which basically shows the urgency required to address the issue"}]
